item.description:
TURKEY BOWL - Part II

All,

What is Thanksgiving without a Turkey Bowl? We may have a tournament like setup if enough people show up, or it may end up a pickup type game as usual. Either way it will be a lot of fun. I hope you can make it. Bring friends or family members to stretch your legs. It may help you feel better about how much you ate for Thanksgiving. All are welcome, regardless of skill level. There will be football both Friday and Saturday. You can come to either or both.

Let me know if you need directions, or check the attached map.

Hope to see you there,
-Frank
item.name: TURKEY BOWL - PART II - SAT Nov. 29 - NOON - RUSSELL FIELD
